Name: Dad's Hamburger Gravy
Description: This is one of my favorite recipes that I learned from my Southern cookin' Dad. Creamy hamburger gravy with just the right blend of spices is perfect served over just about anything!
Author: RHONDA35

Name: Chicken Marsala Florentine
Description: This is a gorgeous chicken dish with sun-dried tomatoes, spinach, and mushrooms. It is so wonderful when served with garlic mashed potatoes. It tastes fantastic!
Author: SHANOU

Name: Tilapia Scaloppine
Description: Tilapia, always quick and easy to cook, gets an Italian update with capers and fresh mushrooms.
Author: ROBINJOY77

Name: Mushroom and Swiss Burger Meatloaf
Description: This meatloaf tastes like a mushroom Swiss burger because it has a layer of  cheese and mushrooms hidden inside.
Author: Alta Nesbitt Rees Sieker

Name: Chocolate Chia Seed Pudding
Description: This very simple and extremely delicious recipe uses chia seeds, cocoa powder, hazelnut-flavored instant coffee powder, and milk to make a pudding.
Author: Robynowitz

Name: Indian-Style Chicken and Onions
Description: Indian-style chicken and onions is seasoned with just the right amount of spices for a warm and flavorful meal everyone will love.
Author: phosmane

Name: Bolognese Stuffed Bell Peppers
Description: A rich Italian-style meat and tomato filling is mixed with rice or orzo, and baked in bell peppers.
Author: KASM75

Name: Stir Fried Sesame Vegetables with Rice
Description: Asparagus, red bell pepper, onion, mushrooms, ginger and garlic stir-fried in peanut oil and garnished with toasted sesame seeds.  Serve over rice.
Author: dakota kelly

Name: Chef John's Indoor BBQ Shrimp
Description: If the weather puts a damper on your barbeque plans, these indoor barbeque shrimp are so easy and fast. Use the raw, ready-to-peel shrimp that are deveined but still have their shells on to achieve the char-grilled look without worrying about dry shrimp.
Author: Chef John

Name: Delicious Vegan Date Fudge Balls
Description: Dates, peanut butter, and cocoa powder are rolled together in these delicious vegan date fudge balls, an on-the-go treat for kids and adults.
Author: MyHealthyDessert

Name: Millionaire's Shortbread Bars (Vegan + Gluten-Free)
Description: These Millionaire's shortbread bars, made with almond flour, almond butter, and coconut oil, are vegan and gluten-free and great for Easter.
Author: Simply Sweet MAC

Name: Super Moist Raspberry Lemon Cake
Description: Sour cream and raspberry preserves are the key ingredients that make this raspberry lemon cake super moist with every bite.
Author: Caitlyn Eakins

Name: Breakfast for Dinner Casserole
Description: Crescent roll dough is the crust in this egg casserole with turkey sausage, plenty of cheese, and veggies, great for breakfast or dinner.
Author: Mrs4man

Name: Breakfast For Dinner
Description: Rice, eggs, and bacon topped with cinnamon sugar is a winning combination for a quick and easy breakfast bowl or breakfast for dinner.
Author: Daniel Peel

Name: Fabienne's Grilled Center Cut Pork Chops
Description: Grilled center cut pork chops with a mayonnaise-paprika marinade are so tender and addictive your guests will be asking for the recipe.
Author: Fabienne Riesen

Name: Pesto-Coated Center-Cut Pork Chop
Description: Center cut pork chops with pesto and red pepper flakes are a delicious way to enjoy pork chops; serve with your favorite grain and vegetable.
Author: kaz

Name: Thin Crust Pizza Dough
Description: Homemade thin crust pizza dough is quick and easy to make, using 6 ingredients you may already have on hand; add your favorite toppings!
Author: caradae

Name: Gluten-Free Easter Egg Cookies
Description: Easter cookies with cassava flour and potato starch are gluten-free and can fit into a paleo diet, subbing almond flour for potato starch.
Author: Little Bites of Beauty

Name: Vegan Avocado Brownies
Description: These quick and easy, vegan brownies made with avocado, coconut oil, and cacao powder will surely please everyone that tries them.
Author: Annie

Name: Puerto Rican Sancocho
Description: Sancocho, a Puerto Rican beef stew made with potatoes, corn on the cob, and chayote squash, is a warm and comforting meal for cold days.
Author: nydiah

Name: Layered Waldorf Salad
Description: Lettuce, red grapes, apples, toasted walnuts, and blue cheese are layered in a trifle bowl to make this beautifully presented Waldorf salad.
Author: Stasty Cook

Name: Layered Salmon Cobb Salad
Description: This show-stopping cobb salad with layers of salmon, green beans, and tomatoes will look like a work of art at the center of your table.
Author: Stasty Cook

Name: Chicken Curry with Goat's Milk
Description: Chicken is simmered with sweet potato, apples, turmeric, and fresh ginger in this hearty curry made with goat's milk instead of cow's milk.
Author: Michael Bach

Name: Scrumptious Wheat Pound Cake
Description: This pound cake made with whole wheat pastry flour, goat milk, and a sugar substitute is scrumptious if you're on a restrictive diet.
Author: tgbryant

Name: Tzatziki Guacamole
Description: Fans of avocados and garlic will love this tzatziki makeover inspired by guacamole and loaded with fresh cilantro, mint, and dill.
Author: MandaSquared

Name: Spicy Ma Po Tofu
Description: Soft tofu is flavored with ginger, garlic, and spicy doubanjiang paste in this easy recipe for authentic ma po tofu from Sichuan, China.
Author: Yipingxiang

Name: Middle Eastern-Style Burek
Description: A beef and onion mixture seasoned with baharat and parsley is deep-fried in egg roll wrappers to make these tasty Middle Eastern-style burek.
Author: Zachary Buckholz

Name: Delicious Vegetarian Bolognese
Description: This deeply flavored vegetarian Bolognese sauce made with mushrooms, carrots, and red lentils gets a spicy kick from sambal oelek.
Author: AngelasHeaven.com

Name: Cranberry Orange Pancakes
Description: These holiday-inspired cranberry orange pancakes are gluten-free thanks to sorghum flour and are bursting with fresh citrus flavor.
Author: Megan Olson
